passages.text:
Heat in the air is surprisingly high for a September day, which is getting on your nerves. After finding the same log of wood for the third time, you can no longer deny the fact that you are lost in the trees.
The phone being out of service makes you regret this hiking. You have been trapped in the trees for 6 hours now. The sky is getting darker and there is a wolf-howl every now and then. 
Whoosh! A cloud of fairy dust exploded in front of you and there walked out a grandmother in pink robe.
"Greatings! My name is Gramma R. I can guide you home if you have enough command of GRAMMAR!" The lady announces. The fairy dusts gathers to words in mid-air: "A lot of traffic accidents____ from carelessness". Meanwhile she presents three gift-boxes in front of you.
[[Open gift box writes AROUNSE->AROUNSE Box]]
[[Open gift box writes RISE->RISE Box]]
[[Open gift box writes ARISE->ARISE Box]]
passages.name: Autumn Trees

passages.text:
The bees inside were arounsed by your opening the box. They are ready to take off and chase you!
[[Close AROUNSE box and try agian->Autumn Trees]]

links.name: Close AROUNSE box and try agian

passages.name: AROUNSE Box

passages.text:
A green serpent rises from the box whose eyes stares right at you and whose venom drips from fangs. It's comming at you!
[[Close RISE box and try again->Autumn Trees]]

links.name: Close RISE box and try again

passages.name: RISE Box

passages.text:
Congradulations! A magic compass is inside the box. You found your way home!
[[Go home->Home]]
passages.name: ARISE Box

passages.text:
Nothing is better than a good night of sleep at home. Feeling energized, you want to go out to play.
[[Go hiking->Autumn Trees]]
[[Go swimming->Beach]]
passages.name: Home

passages.text:
Drifting on the sea in a swim-ring, you feel cold and desperate. You have been drifted away from the beach for an hour. "Why did I have to show off and take that risk??", you think to yourself regretfully.
Whoosh! A white-haired lady in a pink robe appeared in front of you, standing on water. 
"My name is Gramma R. My magic can guide you to land, only if you have enough command of GRAMMAR!" 
Gramma R waves a shiny purple wand elegantly and fairy dusts gathered into words in mid-air: "There is an increasing ____ to make movies describing violence." 
Three swim-rings appear on water for you to grab.
[[Grab the swim-ring writes TREND->TREND swim-ring]]
[[Grab the swim-ring writes DIRECTION->DIRECTION swim-ring]]
[[Grab the swim-ring writes STRENGTH->STRENGTH swim-ring]]
passages.name: Beach

passages.text:
Congradulations! The magic swim-ring takes you upon the beach. You can go home now.
[[Go home->Home]]
passages.name: TREND swim-ring

passages.text:
The moment you touches the swim-ring, a gigantic whirlpool is summoned right next to you! You are being pulled to the bottom of ocean!
[[Let go of the DIRECTION swim-ring and choose again->Beach]]

links.name: Let go of the DIRECTION swim-ring and choose again

passages.name: DIRECTION swim-ring

passages.text:
The swim-ring starts squirming at the touch of your hand! It turns into a red octopus. The strong octopus extends its legs and starts to attack you!
[[Let go of the swim-ring and choose again->Beach]]

links.name: Let go of the swim-ring and choose again

passages.name: STRENGTH swim-ring
